channel.title: Chemodan Clan on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Chemodan Clan on Rusland 1

item.title: The Chemodan – Our Hip-Hop (Наш Хип-Хоп)
item.description: By The Chemodan (Facebook, VK). Featuring Эфди Вадим (Efdi/fd Vadim, VK) and ОУ74 (24smi, VK). Video featuring Denis Sladkov (Denis Sladkov). Directed by Лёша Ломов (Lesja Lomov, Instagram, YouTube). From Абсурд и аллегория (2015). Lyrics More Круги под глазами (2014) Запах Урбана (with Brick Bazuka) (2014) Выживший выкидыш (2014) Read The Chemodan: “I’m like a football fan.

item.title: Pharaoh (ft. The Chemodan Clan) – Problems
item.description: Бабки несут проблемы Суки несут проблемы Все, что несет проблемы Делает меня зверем Money or Grandmas That word бабки can be misunderstood (as Google Translate used to or – update – did) as grandmas, derived from бабушки. But it’s actually a slang term for money.
